website_summaries.verdict: A crash-tested hand-controlled drone with a slight learning curve.
pros: Despite its small size, the body is extremely durable
The mouse-like hand controller is relatively intuitive once you get the hang of it
cons: Not as responsive as some would like and it's very lightweight, so even light winds make it difficult to control outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and has held up to crashing!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Flies it all over outdoors. It took her awhile to get the hang of it because you use hand positioning for it (the control is in your palm). Now she is a pro like her siblings. Good starter drone, and durable--she has crashed it multiple times and hasn't lost any parts. Keeps on flying!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lillard

customer_reviews.title: I am really surprised how fun this little drone is to fly
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised how fun this little drone is to fly! It did take me some time to get use to the controls and how to muenover but after a few flights you will get it down. The battery life is actually pretty incredible. You will need 3 AAA batteries for remote but thats all you will need to get it up in the air. It comes with the USB charger for the drone battery. I wish the clear piece for your fingers to go into was bigger. I have large fat finger and its pretty tight getting them in there. But definitely a fun product I recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to fly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for grandkids for Christmas. One was DOA. The other worked fine but kids had a difficult time keeping it in the air. Very light weight and subject to any wind.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: It's actually pretty difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Because the controller is so bizarre it takes a bit to figure out, and it's kinda small too. We got it for the price and as a kind of stocking stuffer prize so it did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: K Holland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones learning to fly a drone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little ones learning to fly a drone, easier than the toggles, works kind of like a mouse for a computer, takes a little while to get used to the movements but really fun for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Batery life is very low!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very low hence returned it. But the quality was good and is definitely worth the price for $13. The gesture control takes a bit of getting used to, but it's fun once you get the knack of it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky June

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain for the kids! It was really easy for the little ones (8 and 11) to learn. We have other drones that they cannot fly without completely destroying. This one they enjoy for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Six Gun

customer_reviews.title: strange
customer_reviews.text: definitely a learning curve this drone has, im still trying to learn it. will post another when I get it....
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Stay indoors when using this. It’s best as to not needing to climb things 😂
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a fun toy 8 plus my rear this is enjoyable at any age folks lol. I tease the kids and dog with this and it’s a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin I Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I think my son will love this. have not tested it out but so far what I can see it is great
customer_reviews.author: Seana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not truly headless and not very accurately responsive.it does however take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Riaz

customer_reviews.title: H
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheap and hard to fly because of it. Have had good luck with other brands
customer_reviews.author: Shane B.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like someone had it before and resold/re gifted it
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried this product as yet. I am considering if i should return it. I purchased this for a gift. However, the package looks suspicious and was a big turn off. It looks like someone had it before and resold/re gifted it. There was no care to how the items were placed in the package and now I am concerned that it may not work well and that it may be different that what was presented on-line (manufacture listed is also different).
customer_reviews.author: OS

product_meta.title: Goolsky TB-802 Mini drone RC Quadcopter with Gesture Control&3D Flips &One-key Motion Controlling Function Play For Fun Level
product_meta.description:
This TECHBOY TB-802 drone features 2.4GHz motion controlling. Equipped with the motion controller, you can use your hands to control the RC quadcopter's action. How fantastic it is!
Note: Two types USB randomly delivered.

Features:
Motion Controlling 360° flips for cool operating and flying.
Exquisite appearance, easy and safe to operate.
2.4G radio control distance about 20m.
3.7V 280mAh rechargeable Li-po battery for about 5-8mins flying time.
3 * AAA battery needed for transmitter (not included)
Lightweight and durable materials..
Bright LED light increases fun of flying at night.

Specifications:
Model: TB-802 Motion Controlling Drone
Main material: ABS
Remote control: 2.4GHz
Gyroscope: six axis
Motor type: brushed motor
Function: fly up/down, forward, backward, left, right, turn left, turn right, 360° flips
Remote distance: about 20m
Battery for quadcopter: 3.7V 280mAh Li-po battery (32 * 20 * 8mm)
Charging time: about 30mins
Working time: about 5-8mins
Battery of remote controller: 3 * AAA Battery (not included)
Item dimensions: 155 * 155 * 35mm (L * W * H)
Item weight: 34g

Notice: Carefully read the instruction before any use, if you are a beginner, it's advisable to be assisted by an experienced adult.

Package List
1 * RC Quadcopter
1 * 2.4G Motion Controller (Blue/yellow color shipped in random)
1 * 3.7V 280mAh Li-po Battery
2 * Pair of Spare Propellers (Blue/yellow color shipped in random)
2 * Finger Holder
1 * USB Charging Cable
1 * User Manual
feature_bullets: Motion Controlling 360° flips for cool operating and flying.
Bright LED light increases fun of flying at night; Lightweight and durable materials..
Exquisite appearance, easy and safe to operate.
3.7V 280mAh rechargeable Li-po battery for about 5-8mins flying time.
